The President challenged Americans to work together to fight the biggest threat to our future--climate change. Bravo! #ActOnClimate
We all have a stake in urgent action RT@BarackObama We owe it to our kids to do smthng re climate change.Tune in Tues http://t.co/kGIMmofvm3
There is no climate debate; climate change is unambiguous, real & urgent to address. The choices we make now ensure our future or disable it
Thanks to @WHOImedia, our engineers, and the @DeepseaAmerica team for a great #DEEPSEACHALLENGER reception today

RT @DeepseaAmerica: Rolling through AZ, reminded that #DEEPSEACHALLENGER reached a depth of over 35k feet - six times as deep as the Grand …
Follow @DeepseaAmerica. I mean it. http://t.co/WEtS2lJNBw
Join #DEEPSEACHALLENGER on its educational adventure across America. Follow us @DeepseaAmerica on Twitter and Instagram for daily updates
Gearing up to speak at @DeepseaAmerica launch in LA today at 1:30. I hear there'll be a marching band. For more info http://t.co/C82d6fYJtu
It dove deeper than Everest is high. Come check out the sub Saturday, June 1 at @casciencecenter #deepseachallenge http://t.co/RdBbgrDT69
Back to writing AVTR 2,3. Thanks for checking out @RedCarpetGreenD
2 days left to help set a sustainable trend. Check out my wife's eco-design contest  @RedCarpetGreenD http://t.co/v2Cun4Zq @suzymusing
Some talk the talk re environment but my wife @suzymusing walks the walk-on the red carpet. Enter her Oscar contest now http://t.co/v2Cun4Zq
Phase One expedition is over after 13 dives.  Sub is great and team is tired.  Heading home. Scientists at work now analyzing the results.
Pic from sub co-designer Ron Allum's recent @DeepChallenge dive- he dove like a champ- to 3,600+ ft #deepseachallenge http://t.co/ASu7x3g8
Sub co-designer Ron Allum made his first @DeepChallenge dive today. 3,600 ft & he dove the sub like a champ. Awesome pix! #deepseachallenge
@zoesaldana Zoe, now you know why we haven't started #Avatar 2 yet. I've been "immersed" in smthg else. But I'll always be true to the blue.
@jessicaalba Jess, thanks for having my back, as always. How's the launch of your new product line?
@Schwarzenegger You always taught me that the impossible just takes a little longer.I'll tell you all about the dive when I see you bk in LA
It's right to go frm @DeepChallenge dives to the #Titanic3D premiere b/c the same driving force inspired both, my fascination w/deep #oceans
It's been 40+ hrs of highs & literal lows. I'll return to diving soon, but now time to focus on the launch of #Titanic3D
Incredible that 7yrs ago a research trip to Challenger Deep was impossible.Our #deepseachallenge team built a sub for a new exploration era
Back from trip to deepest pl on Earth -#oceans hadal zone.Puts a new spin on "to hell and back". Good to see the sunshine. #deepseachallenge
Just arrived at the ocean's deepest pt. Hitting bottom never felt so good. Can't wait to share what I'm seeing w/ you @DeepChallenge
Thx for support of science&exploration.When explorers go to hostile realms-space or sea-we live or die by our machines. http://t.co/yuBAopth
I only tweet when I have something worth saying. Today is the culmination of a 7 yr project. It's finally dive day. Follow us @DeepChallenge
Skynet was supposed to go operational tonight.  Instead of machines taking over, we have the very real threat of global warming.
I'm at #CinemaCon today, talking about the NEXT revolution in digital cinema – high frame-rates.  It’s incredible.
I wasn't in Brazil for fun. I was there to help tribal people fight the dams that are going to destroy their homes and forest.
Arnold @Schwarzenegger and I were hanging out in the rainforest with my indigenous friends.  They gave us both war clubs (watch yr ass).
Tom, now you know why I cancelled lunch. RT @TomArnold: Good luck in the brazillian rainforest guys @jimcameron and @schwarzenegger
Sorry I've been away. I've been head-down writing Avatar 2 & 3 but had to leave Pandora for the real Pandora RT @KrissOnYT: TWEET SOMETHING!
I know you're always ready for an adventure, anytime anywhere.  And this was for a good cause RT @Schwarzenegger: Landing on the Xingu River
If you missed it live, here's a link to my underwater #Sanctum interview w/ @iJustine: http://on.fb.me/grb5tf #virginmobilelive
Live-streaming underwater? "What could possibly go wrong?” A shot from@AquariumPacific #Sanctum http://yfrog.com/h59fdij
The only whale we're going to see today.  No sign of the #FailWhale Bring on the ?s #virginmobilelive #Sanctum http://yfrog.com/h0mxolxj
I’m answering your #Sanctum questions from the bottom of an aquarium tank. Tag ?'s w/ #virginmobilelive & watch live http://on.fb.me/grb5tf
The #Sanctum media blitz rolls on – prepping for an interview we’re doing live today at 9am PST from @AquariumPacific in Long Beach, CA
RT @TheUnderwire: Ask James Cameron a question. Maybe he'll answer during underwater live chat, 9 a.m. Pacific Thursday http://ht.ly/3Pn ...
Did everyone love Black Swan as much as me?  My daughter Josa & I are 2 thumbs way up on Aronofsky's masterpiece. Natalie P is magnificent
Don't make a movie about other movies. Live a real life, THEN make stories.   RT @Shak6o9: One advise for prospective filmmakers out there?
It's the most intense experience you'll have at the movies (unless your gf gets creative) RT @badbrad002: No idea what #Sanctum is about?
RT @suzymusing: @jessicaalba @KellySawyer @nicolerichie @JimCameron AWESOME! Thank you for the shout out #Greendress saving the world on ...
Right now it's a #Sanctum promotion (I'm such a ho)…but who knows? It's fun. RT @tenaciouslibbs: Are you here for the long haul?
Full day of radio phoners tomorrow.  Time to get the level of awareness for #Sanctum to match its intensity.
Another shot from the #Sanctum premiere.  Talk about the glare http://yfrog.com/h8b485j
Shot of Richard Roxburgh and I at the #Sanctum premiere http://yfrog.com/gz6ec8j
... might be best to leave fashion to the pros @jessicaalba, can you help us spread the word about #GreenDress? www.redcarpetgreendress.com
Red Carpet Green Dress is running a #GreenDress contest - enter a design by Feb 2 using sustainable materials to win a pre-Oscar LA trip
I dread the glare of red carpets, but it’s not all bad – check out what my wife Suzy is doing over at www.redcarpetgreendress.com
Just in Australia doing #Sanctum press. Worst floods in their history. See Joe Romm's blog for global warming link - http://bit.ly/f4i2Pz
I met Chris Nolan at the DGA awards & told him how much Inception blew me away. He should've gotten an Oscar nom but there's never justice
Back in the saddle today w/ my game face on for the #Sanctum premiere tonight.  It's nice to see the team getting recognition for their work
Hey all.  I was off the air yesterday, hanging around the house with the younglings, and coughing out the last of some lung virus.
Thank god the #Sanctum press junket is over  At least they liked the movie.  SURGEON GENERAL’S WARNING: They all said they couldn’t breathe.
Welcome to our little man-cave.  I'm w/ #Sanctum director @AlisterGrierson & Andrew Wight, my old exploration buddy http://yfrog.com/gyh67ej
Joe, thanks for coming to the screening.  Dinner at the 	Soho was a blast. RT @MysteryGuitarM: Had a great time tonight screening #Sanctum
Freddie, great hanging with you and the YouTubers RT @fwong: saw Sanctum - I recommend it - It's one of the manliest movies I've ever seen
We've got a big jar of F-bombs in #Sanctum. It's not 'gosh darn it' when you cut your finger off.
Jess, we have to do another kick butt project together soon! RT @jessicaalba: Yo tweeples follow my dear friend and mentor @JimCameron!!!
‘My worst nightmare come true’ – that’s producer Andrew Wight whining about the real cave collapse he lived through. #Sanctum
Back at the #Sanctum junket reunited w/the whole cast. Love these guys.  Another marathon day of interviews ahead http://yfrog.com/h2cby3j
Here's me with @TheRealRyanHiga my new bro from the big island. http://plixi.com/p/73226840
Met a great bunch of youtubers tonight in LA.
Day 1 of #Sanctum press down.  The junket marathon is over.  I'm spent baby.  JC out.
Wrong again! http://yfrog.com/h5z58cj RT @THRMattBelloni: Can't be this good at tweeting already. Is Jon Landau producing them for him?
RT @SanctumTheMovie: Looking forward to the release of #Sanctum? Get the full story behind the film from @NatGeoChannel - http://ht.ly/3Lwj9
It’s easy.  Short smartass answers have always been a specialty of mine. RT @Demarkko_LA: @JimCameron Just Started And #tweeing like a #PRO
All my tweets go through several drafts, with new scenes next year RT @FredTopel: @JimCameron Will there be a director's cut of your tweet?
Just finished a big international press conference for #Sanctum w/ @AlisterGrierson & Andrew Wight http://yfrog.com/hs3y5ij
Yes.  But they all die. RT @joellikeshats: @JimCameron Does this mean Sanctum has 140 characters?
Kim, you’re already in 3D!  See you on #Sanctum 2 RT @KimKardashian: @JimCameron! I'm ready for my leading role in 3D! LOL
3D handhelds and laptops are available now. RT @mikelete: @JimCameron When are we going to have the first Tweet in 3D?
I never tweeted before because I'm a long winded blowhard, and they don't allow enough characters.

It turns out @JamesCameron was taken, but not Jim.
RT @syder: How was "@JimCameron" not already taken?
RT @RyanSeacrest: Everyone welcome Avatar director @JimCameron to twitter! I'll have to teach him how to RT this http://yfrog.com/h0g8i4 ...
I'm at the press junket for #Sanctum.  It's basically ten hours of back to back interviews.  Fun times.
ryan seacrest told me I had to get on Twitter.  So here I am.  First tweet.  I feel younger already.
